Cameron Boyce plays **Craig "Krahgg"**, the cousin of Liv and Maddie Rooney, in the *Liv and Maddie* episode **"Prom-a-Rooney"**[1][2]. Initially underwhelming to Maddie, Craig reinvents himself as the illusionist **Krahgg the Insidious**, adding magical drama to the prom storyline[1][2]. This marked Boyce’s first collaboration with Dove Cameron before their roles in *Descendants*[2].
